item.title: ET
item.description: score:-219 Chances: Shell expects LNG demand to grow over 50% by 2040, which should benefit project developers. The master limited partnership could have massive upside potential. Insightful Analysis of Energy Transfer LP’s Market Position and Future Prospects. Companies in The News Are:HBI,WEN,ET,CF Energy Transfer’s expansion strategy is paying big dividends.
